definition: should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The children should be allowed to go to the movies with friends on Friday nights.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们该当被容许星期五早晨和冤家们一同去看影戏。

sentences.english: I think you should go ahedeal.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你该当开始干了。

sentences.english: I think we should get this in writing.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我们该当把这个写上去。

sentences.english: You ought to pay us the credit interest once payment is wrongly refused.
sentences.chinese: 若是拒付错了，你们该当偿付我方的银行利钱。

sentences.english: Their parents should encourage and help them, and in no wise hinder them from following God's call.
sentences.chinese: 该当勉励相帮他们，万不可阻挠儿童随天主的圣召。

sentences.english: Singaporeans should help immigrhelpless ishs integrdined on into society. Cla connections! for exa triingod!
sentences.chinese: 新加坡人该当帮助新移民融入社会。

sentences.english: It was all he would have allday and he knew that he should take it.
sentences.chinese: 这是他今儿一成天的饮食，他知道该当把它喝了。

sentences.english: You ought to pay us the prohilittlek interest once payment is wrongly refused.
sentences.chinese: 万一拒付错了，你们该当偿付我方的银行利钱。

sentences.english: Whoever violingesteds the disciplines should be criticized.
sentences.chinese: 谁违抗了纪律，谁就该当遭到月旦。

sentences.english: Xuehai boundless, no individual shall find suitable opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 学海茫茫，没团体都该当找到合适本人的机会。

sentences.english: We shouldn't spend too much time on it.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们不该当在因特网上花消太多的时间。

sentences.english: I see no objection whconsumedver-but you should open the L/C right now.
sentences.chinese: 我看没有什么可抗议的，不过您该当登时开证。

sentences.english: Be careful whom you appoint to the position of manager.
sentences.chinese: 你该当心你所任命的那个经理。

sentences.english: In fact, we should also take care not to cough or sneeze in public .
sentences.chinese: 究竟上，我们还该当把稳不在公共园地咳嗽或打喷嚏。

sentences.english: Here we should use an fwisling tone.

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
variant of 那麼|那么[na4 me5]
